info.name: Hotmail/Outlook redeem whitespace
info.description: Recover ads banner space (bottom and right side). Hides "Upgrade to Office 360" link. Reduces the height of lines in the folders list. Reduces the height of lines in emails listing in the 3 modes: without preview pane, with preview pane at the bottom and with preview pane on the right side. For more styles, userscripts, tips, ..., go to http://users.skynet.be/alternity/programming/
info.additionalInfo:
2019/06/21:
 - MS changed the names of the styles. If I missed something, please post a comment.

2019/05/12:
 - fixed listing line's height with preview displayed on the right
 - fixed line's height in all predefined modes (new hotmail options)

2019/04/24:
 - refined style for page with reading pane hidden or shown at bottom (when "attachment preview" enabled)
 - gained a couple pixels on page with reading pane on the right
 - fixed line height in folder list

Initial release 2018/12/17

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("outlook.live.com") {
/*version:20190621.1*/
#GoToNextRegion + div {right: 0 !important;} /* old layout */
._n_h, /* old layout */
 ._2qPmszDwBfYpF7PO9Mn3KN, ._2KxiN0IH0mUjw-Bw6WdAoB, ._1K0cujP_EBzCd77bTesW1q, /*._3a6SuYqdwIspGohT1zu16B,/*20181129*/
 ._1_ag99JsBHxI6S4FP5ayPv/*20181212*/, ._3_hHr3kfEhbNYRFM5YJxH9 /*20190621*/
  {display:none !important;} /* hide right/bottom ad-panel */

._1429Ddb-M-DRKHKbjzLCpJ, /*._2W63cKXK-LlReDmK5VbcKh,/*20181129*/ ._34_bqC0c1-8H3B0lGzop-9/*20181212*/,
 .qDw7SZ9r6S7r0_qZS1aIG /*20190621*/
  {height: 28px !important;} /* reduce height folders rows */

._1x0NRQ4xIoC0ZaTr2yjnJc, ._20YsfelFmugQWgNkXdkYaF, /*._38BeQ9jAHLoEF3cMxZuWFu,/*20181129*/ ._1ZEdP0-JdMOVtjBb5ZcM6M/*20181212*/,
 ._4EQjiwXF4KIhqby_Qqf8J /*20190621*/
  {display:none !important;} /* hide Office365 ad */

.wGMA4S4jTalSojdkGeSpe,/*.vBvmkyQaykKu5h_-d4y1,._33s8e6SCVPn7nmkV8q4kiH,/*20181129*/
 ._3am_5-Qakpw6Y1uciOunxX /*,._1jUc7XmCf58lXmcD_z5DxF/*+20181212 -20190424*/,
 ._3ueQ2XhOnGTejEeJYwrrHP > div._1JG8MPYAYFuJ9m1k7gmlsl ._1jUc7XmCf58lXmcD_z5DxF > div /*20190512*/,
 ._1Hh_5tgtQMl_-8ZxbRuE_G ._3RNhHhUHeoKc1ufD-hcz7q /*20190621*/
  {height: 24px !important;} /* reduce height mail listing */

._1v2IcgkRQQlt8iGBLH6fT4/*20190512*/ /*._1W3cZGkECxa-pB7PWTJwvr /*+20190424 -20190512*/,
 ._1iwOjoW9EOaZlAdGjDljbk /*20190621*/
  {margin-bottom: 0 !important;} /*20190424*/

._3sX5i3YCj5GXb5sp6MeA5p > div /*20190424*/, ._2miAFnGHXlWwulyUmLEbzZ > div /*20190621*/
  {height: 16px;} /*with show right*/

._3sX5i3YCj5GXb5sp6MeA5p > div > div /*20190424*/, ._2miAFnGHXlWwulyUmLEbzZ > div > div /*20190621*/
  {vertical-align: top !important;
   margin-top: -2px;}

._1Vl2_eFB1avEgWW9daf2iH,/*.QkyD6yQ5wbphYaJAKU12s,/*20181129*/ .mXveB7UpZfP8v-UXpJOpz/*20181212*/,
 ._18LAllQi61d4a4XNAr9prg /*20190621*/
  {padding: 1px 0 !important;} /* reduce height mail listing with preview right */
}
